itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: George Edward Andrews (24 September 1904 – 28 December 1989) was a Welsh dual code rugby wing who played rugby union for Newport RFC and rugby league for Leeds. Andrews was capped for the Wales rugby union team on five occasions.He attended Taunton School and St Julian's High School, Newport.
